Package com.tradingcards.elements.deck

Class DeckView

java.lang.Object
com.tradingcards.elements.deck.DeckView
public class DeckView extends Object
View class responsible for handling user input and displaying output related to deck operations.

  • Method Details

    • basicPanel

      public JPanel basicPanel(String message)

    • setDeckName

      public String setDeckName()
      Prompts the user to input the name of the deck.
      Returns:
      the deck name entered by the user

    • setDeckType

      public String setDeckType()
      Displays a dialog for the user to select a deck type from a predefined list.

      The method uses a JOptionPane input dialog with the following options:

      • Normal Deck
      • Sellable Deck
      The first option ("Normal Deck") is selected by default.

      Returns:
      the selected deck type as a String, or null if the user cancels the dialog or closes it without making a selection.

    • showDeckForm

      public DeckModel showDeckForm()
      Displays the deck creation form to the user and returns a DeckModel containing the deck's name and type as entered by the user.

      If the user cancels the form by entering a sentinel value (e.g., "-999") or null at any step, the method returns null to indicate that deck creation was aborted.

      Returns:
      a DeckModel with user-inputted name and type, or null if the operation was cancelled

    • showYesNoOptions

      public int showYesNoOptions(String message, String title)

    • setCardName

      public String setCardName()
      Prompts the user to input the name of a card in the deck.
      Returns:
      the card name entered by the user

    • setCardNumber

      public int setCardNumber()
      Prompts the user to input the number of a card in the deck.
      Returns:
      the card number entered by the user

    • cardSelectionOption

      public int cardSelectionOption()
      Asks the user how they want to select a card from the deck.
      Returns:
      the user's input, expected to be "name" or "number"

    • displayDecks

      public JPanel displayDecks(HashMap<String,DeckModel> deckCollection)
      Displays the names of all available decks in the collection.
      Parameters:
      deckCollection - the collection of all existing decks

    • displayDeckContent

      public JPanel displayDeckContent(HashMap<String,CardModel> deck)
      Displays the contents of a single deck including card names and their order number.
      Parameters:
      deck - the map of card names to card objects in the deck
